scripts.build: cd frontend/team_sync_front && npm install -g @vue/cli @vue/cli-service @vue/cli-plugin-babel @vue/cli-plugin-eslint @vue/cli-plugin-router @vue/cli-plugin-vuex && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && vue-cli-service build && cd ../.. && mkdir -p static && cp -r frontend/team_sync_front/dist/* static/
